title: U.S. DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE
ingredients: 1/2 pound 85% lean ground turkey (or ground sausage or beef)
directions: Wash hands with soap and water.
Brown the ground meat, onion, and garlic in a large skillet or heavy saucepan. Drain off any grease.
Add the tomato sauce, water, and uncooked pasta.

Add the fresh or frozen vegetables. Stir and continue cooking until the pasta and vegetables are tender, about 10 more minutes. Notes Frozen vegetables used for nutritional analysis and costing purposes. Learn more about: Onions Garlic Tomatoes Zucchini https://www.myplate.gov/recipes/skillet-pasta-dinner 2/6
